column1: Las Ánimas is a large sector of the Chilean city of Valdivia. It lies to the east of the city center
column2: from which it is separated by the Calle-Calle River
column3: and extends along the western bank of the Calle-Calle to the city's northern limits. Downtown Valdivia is connected to Las Ánimas by the Calle Calle Bridge. The sector contains several neighborhoods and commercial and industrial sites.
